quoteText: We can change these Terms at any time. We keep a historical record of all changes to our Terms on GitHub. If a change is material, we’ll let you know before they take effect. By using Medium on or after that effective date, you agree to the new Terms. If you don’t agree to them, you should delete your account before they take effect, otherwise your use of the site and content will be subject to the new Terms.
title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
